name: Me and the Martians
description:
• Left/Right arrows to walk
  • Up/Down arrows to climb ladders
  • Down arrow to toggle/hold ducking, depending on settings
  • X to jump
  • C to continue/finish dialogue
  • Up/Down arrows to select yes/no during certain dialogue
  • I am a boss at programming. On a completely unrelated note, saving is broken.

Art+Programming - Yohei Nojiri

Music - Daniel Kerley

Software/libraries used:

LMMS, Flixel, Bfxr, Flashdevelop, Audacity, DAME, GIMP, MS Paint
